title: What is your favorite champion to play each roll with?

arent you supose to always build the same build on riven wich u carry with no matter where u play howmuch ur behind or ahead and no matter howmuch gold you have or who your fighting ??

that seems to work best for riven 
( i have learned from watching what all other riven players do)
I mean: the build path is the only diffrence between {{champion:92}} and {{champion:7}}, that is, unless AD Leblanc/AP Riven are a thing now
Well, late S4, early S5, we did have that Korean AD LB top crap.
